title: Fetch many customers
summary: Fetch list of customers. Returns only customers the authenticated user is authorized to view.

title: Fetch one customer
summary: Fetch one customer by ID. Authenticated user must have permission to view this customer.

title: Create customer
summary: Create customer. Authenticated user must have permission to modify this customer..

title: Modify customer
summary: Modify customer. Authenticated user must have permission to modify this customer..

title: Delete customer
summary: Delete customer. Authenticated user must have permission to modify this customer..

title: Fetch many orders
summary: Fetch list of orders. Returns only orders belonging to customers the authenticated user is authorized to view.

title: Fetch one order
summary: Fetch order by orderId. Authenticated user must have permission to view this order's customer

title: Create order
summary: Create order. Authenticated user must have permission to modify this order's customer.

title: Modify order
summary: Modify order. Authenticated user must have permission to modify this order's customer.

title: Delete order
summary: Delete order. Authenticated user must have permission to modify this order's customer.
